content: अतिग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [गम्-ड] (in <ab>comp.</ab>) Exceeding, going beyond, transcending, excelling, surpassing; सर्वलोक° <ls>Mu. 1. 2</ls>; किमौषधपथातिगैरुपहतो महाव्याधिभिः <ls>Mu. 6</ls> by diseases defying the powers of medicine, past the stage of physicking; बाणैर्देहातिगैः <ls>R. 12. 48</ls> piercing through their bodies; वयो° <ls>Ms. 7. 149</ls> advanced in years, aged; संख्यातिगाः संपदः <ls>Bh. 3. 132</ls>; वपुः प्रकर्षेण जनातिगेन <ls>Ki. 3. 2.</ls>
